INGEST_INVALID_INPUT.message: Input failed structural validation or could not be read deterministically.

INGEST_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT.message: Input format is unsupported by the kernel.

NORMALIZE_RULE_VIOLATION.message: Normalization rules were violated or produced a non-deterministic result.

ATOMIZE_SCHEMA_MISMATCH.message: Event extraction failed due to schema mismatch or ambiguous structure.

LEDGER_ORDERING_VIOLATION.message: Event ordering invariants could not be enforced.

LEDGER_HASH_FAILURE.message: Hash chain generation failed or produced inconsistent results.

REPLAY_MISMATCH.message: Replay output does not match the original deterministic ledger.

INVARIANT_BREACH.message: A kernel invariant was violated and execution was halted.
